ielts_courses.title: IELTS Academic Complete Preparation Course
ielts_courses.description: Comprehensive IELTS Academic preparation covering all four sections: Listening, Reading, Writing, and Speaking. Includes practice tests, strategies, and personalized feedback.
ielts_courses.shortDescription: Complete IELTS Academic prep with practice tests and strategies

ielts_courses.title: IELTS General Training Mastery
ielts_courses.description: Specialized course for IELTS General Training test takers. Focus on practical English skills for immigration and work purposes.
ielts_courses.shortDescription: IELTS General Training prep for immigration and work

ielts_courses.title: IELTS Writing Task 1 & 2 Excellence
ielts_courses.description: Deep dive into IELTS Writing tasks with detailed analysis, sample essays, and scoring criteria. Perfect for students targeting Band 7+ in Writing.
ielts_courses.shortDescription: Master IELTS Writing tasks for Band 7+ scores

ielts_courses.title: IELTS Speaking Confidence Builder
ielts_courses.description: Build confidence and fluency for IELTS Speaking test. Includes pronunciation practice, common topics, and interview techniques.
ielts_courses.shortDescription: Build confidence for IELTS Speaking test

toefl_courses.title: TOEFL iBT Complete Preparation Course
toefl_courses.description: Comprehensive TOEFL iBT preparation covering Reading, Listening, Speaking, and Writing sections. Includes practice tests and score improvement strategies.
toefl_courses.shortDescription: Complete TOEFL iBT prep with practice tests

toefl_courses.title: TOEFL Speaking & Writing Mastery
toefl_courses.description: Advanced course focusing on TOEFL Speaking and Writing sections. Learn effective strategies for integrated and independent tasks.
toefl_courses.shortDescription: Master TOEFL Speaking and Writing sections

toefl_courses.title: TOEFL Reading Comprehension Strategies
toefl_courses.description: Specialized course for TOEFL Reading section. Learn time management, question types, and reading strategies for academic texts.
toefl_courses.shortDescription: TOEFL Reading strategies and time management

gre_courses.title: GRE Complete Preparation Program
gre_courses.description: Comprehensive GRE preparation covering Verbal Reasoning, Quantitative Reasoning, and Analytical Writing. Includes practice tests and score improvement strategies.
gre_courses.shortDescription: Complete GRE prep with all sections covered

gre_courses.title: GRE Analytical Writing Excellence
gre_courses.description: Master GRE Analytical Writing with detailed analysis of Issue and Argument tasks. Learn scoring criteria and writing techniques for high scores.
gre_courses.shortDescription: Master GRE Analytical Writing for high scores

gre_courses.title: GRE Quantitative Reasoning Mastery
gre_courses.description: Advanced course for GRE Quantitative Reasoning. Covers arithmetic, algebra, geometry, and data analysis with practice problems and strategies.

pte_courses.title: PTE Academic Complete Preparation
pte_courses.description: Comprehensive PTE Academic preparation covering all communicative skills: Speaking, Writing, Reading, and Listening. Includes practice tests and score improvement strategies.
pte_courses.shortDescription: Complete PTE Academic prep with all skills

pte_courses.title: PTE Speaking & Pronunciation Mastery
pte_courses.description: Specialized course for PTE Speaking section. Focus on pronunciation, fluency, and speaking strategies for high scores.

pte_courses.title: PTE Writing Skills Excellence
pte_courses.description: Advanced course for PTE Writing section. Learn essay writing, summarization, and writing strategies for high scores.

general_english_courses.title: English Grammar Fundamentals
general_english_courses.description: Comprehensive English grammar course covering all essential grammar rules, tenses, and structures for effective communication.

general_english_courses.title: Business English Communication
general_english_courses.description: Professional English communication skills for business environments. Includes email writing, presentations, and meeting skills.
